text:
David Cecil MacAlister Tomlinson (7 May 1917 – 24 June 2000) was an English actor and comedian. He was known for playing George Banks in "Mary Poppins", Professor Emelius Browne in "Bedknobs and Broomsticks" and Peter Thorndyke in "The Love Bug". Tomlinson was born in Henley-on-Thames, Oxfordshire.
Timlinson died on 24 June 2000 from a stroke in London, aged 83.
